title: Ticket #574: RemoteUserPrio broken in 7.3.1
description:
The following commit appears to have accidentally removed the call to addRemoteUserPrios(). This means RemoteUserPrio is not inserted into the startd ad. This breaks typical PREEMPTION_REQUIREMENTS expressions causing them to never evaluate to true. (We observed this problem on CHTC.)

I am re-inserting the call to addRemoteUserPrios(). If there actually was something intentional about this change, then we better figure out what the deal is. 

commit 41c36db2efc7fc700ceb5492a06cb523b9240f23
Author: Ian Alderman <ialderman@cyclecomputing.com>
Date:   Mon Apr 20 09:25:49 2009 -0500

    Add support for ResourceWeight expression to differing slot costs.
    This patch adds support for having different slots "cost" different
    amounts against the group quota (right now every slot costs 1). In the
    config file for a startd, ResourceWeight is a ClassAd expression which
    evaluates to the weight or cost of the resource. (gittrac #331)
check_ins: 2009-Jun-17 14:19   Check-in [14923]: Fixed RemoteUserPrio. Commit 41c36db appears to have accidentally removed the call to addRemoteUserPrios(). #574 (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
